column4: I'm a little unsure of which encoding to go with (instead of MP3). How would an ogg fair against a FLAC? Which should I go with?
What would be a good bitrate to go with with OGG?
Hmm... Would the larger file size with FLAC be "worth it?" Would the lossless be much noticeable?
Maybe not in the first transcode, but once you choose lossy you can't go back
